page.title: 19Commuting
page.content: The life of a commuter is the same tedious and boring routine everyday. Many of the people in this area are commuters to London. A commuter's alarm bell rings at 6.00 to 6.30 in the morning for the journey to London is about 1 hour and a half to two hours depending on the traffic.You get up and wash, you then get dressed which will take about half an hour; you then go down stairs and have breakfast this will take about 10 minutes along with your drink of orange juice or coffee whichever you prefer.Into the garage where you climb into your company car.Throw your briefcase into the back seat and hang your jacket up. Push the keys into the ignition and turn the key.It starts first time along with the radio the news bulletin comes on at 6.45. Oh no!you're late,
